name: The Tower of Beatrice
description: This is the Adventure / Room Escape game about an unlucky Thief, who stole a quite babbling book.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8Ghz or equivalent Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
